name: Naruto Spin-Off: Rock Lee & His Ninja Pals: Babysitting Guy Sensei! / Lady Tsunade's Marriage Interview!
short_description: Lee wants be an adult like his sensei, and he gets the chance when Guy turns into a baby. Later, When Lee overhears Lady Tsunade mutter something about being lonely, he sets her up on an arranged marriage meeting.
